person.persName: Benjamin W. Sharp (Columbus, Kentucky, attorney, mayor, and engineer)

body.p: Columbus, Kentucky, attorney, mayor, and engineer. Pennsylvania native. Attorney in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860. President of the Hickman and Ballard County Agricultural and Mechanical Association in 1860. Mayor of Columbus, Kentucky, in 1861. Railroad engineer for the U.S. Army in Columbus in 1862. Imprisoned in Memphis, Tennessee, by the Confederate Army.
